cause.description:
The USDA and most of the 50 states want to treat farmers worse than sex offenders. They want to tag, track and monitor farms, farmers and their livestock.
The National Animal Identification System (NAIS) will not only wipe out small farmers and create higher food costs, destroy local agriculture and farmers' markets but will also give the Multinational AgriCorps exclusive access to your food dollar.
Under the guise of protecting the public from animal disease health outbreaks the USDA has spent millions of dollars on one of the most restrictive and privacy invasive programs to be created in years.
Find out more by visiting http://nonais.org
1. To Protect American's Right To Farm
2. To Stop what amounts to a double tax on food
3. To keep America free from excessive, invasive government control
cause.mission: Prevent the USDA from ruining American Agriculture
cause.name: Stop Animal ID--NO NAIS!
